svg.source: title: User Getting Loan Flow Merchant->Backend: initiateLoanRequest(shopId, aadhar, amount) Backend->Reputation_API: checkReputation(shopId, user_type) Backend->Reputation_API: checkReputation(aadhar, user_type) Backend->Merchant: response to initiateLoanRequest <requestId, status> Merchant->User: <request fingerprint, private key(QR code)> User->Merchant: <provides fingerprint, private key(QR code)> Merchant->Backend: requestLoan(requestId, private key, shopId, authId, aadhar) Backend->User_Contract: getAllowedAccountsByType() Backend->deployedLoanContract: isLoanActive() User->SMS_Gateway: <sms requesting loan with amount> SMS_Gateway->Backend: userLoanRequest(amount, aadhar) Backend->Fund_Contract: provideLoan(user address, Loan Amount, Shopkeeper address, Auth Id) Fund_Contract->*LoanContract: <user address, Loan Amount, Shopkeeper address, Fund address, Auth Id> LoanContract->Backend: <event that loan contract is created> Backend->User_Contract: allow(LoanContract) Backend->LoanContract: verifyUser() LoanContract->User_Contract: hasAccess() LoanContract->Merchant_Bank_Account_contract: deposit(Loan Amount+comission) LoanContract->Backend: <event that Loan is deposited> LoanContract->Bank_Account_Contract: addLoan(loanAmount) Bank_Account_Contract->User_Contract: hasAccess(LoanContract address) User_Contract->Bank_Account_Contract: hasAccess status and contract type LoanContract->Merchant_Reputation_contract: calculateReputation(change_type, amount) LoanContract->User_Reputation_Contract: calculateReputation(change_type, amount) Backend->Core_Banking: <Info that a loan is provided to user> Backend->SMS_Gateway: sendLoanAlert(status) SMS_Gateway->User: <SMS with status of Loan> Backend->Merchant: <Loan Status> Merchant->User: give cash equal to loan amount

text.tspan: requestLoan(requestId, private key, shopId, authId, aadhar)
provideLoan(user address, Loan Amount, Shopkeeper address, Auth Id)
<user address, Loan Amount, Shopkeeper address, Fund address, Auth Id>
<Info that a loan is provided to user>
give cash equal to loan amount
